attributes.action: lower the age of smear testing from 25-20.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is in memory of my late sister in law and close friend Kirsty Winstanley who sadly lost her battle against cervical cancer on the 27th of august 2009 at the devastating age of just 23, and it was her wish for us to get the age of smear testing in the UK lowered to 20 instead of 25 cause if this had happened there is a massive chance that she would still b here, please sign this petition so that we can get this changed and that no other young girl will have to go through the same pain and suffering Kirsty did and they can be in with a fighting chance against such a painful illness.

The age of smear testing needs to be lowered the same as it is in the rest of the uk it could save so many young girls lives.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
